alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 1:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Camden and south central Glynn Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 128 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Jekyll Island, or 7 miles southwest of Brunswick, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, Jekyll Island and Dover Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden
